biography: Kristian, a familiar face from Master Golf Club, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on three occasions. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have remained elusive, Kristian's dedication to the sport is undeniable.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Kristian is a strategist on the course, carefully analyzing each shot before executing with precision. Although Kristian will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his presence is missed, and we remain hopeful for his return to future competitions.
